title: Valuation premium for Bajaj Finance unjustified, says CLSA - Economic Times
content: Valuation premium for Bajaj Finance unjustified, says CLSA  Economic Times
description: "Bajaj Finance's assets under management growth outperformance versus HDFC Bank has now declined from 15 percentage points plus pre-Covid to just 5 percentage points in FY22. We believe that the valuation premium Bajaj Finance enjoys is unjustified," said CLSA.
